title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste doston! Aaj main aapko apni kala yatra ke bare mein batana chahti hoon.
Anushka: Yaad hai, bachpan mein, diwaron par rangon se kya-kya banati thi? Maa daantti thi, lekin dil toh udhar hi laga rehta tha.
Anushka: Phir school hua, padhai hui, sabne kaha "doctor bano, engineer bano."
Anushka: Lekin rangon ki aawaz toh andar goonjti rahi.
Anushka: Ek din, maine socha, "bas, ab nahi!" Aur phir maine canvas uthaya.
Anushka: Pehla painting bilkul bekar tha, lekin usme sachchai thi, junoon tha.
Anushka: Dhire dhire seekhti gayi, galti karti gayi, aur har galti se kuch naya nikala.
Anushka: Aaj, meri paintings aapke saamne hain. Shayad perfect nahi hain, lekin yeh meri kahani ke rang hain.
Anushka: Meri art journey abhi shuru hui hai, aur main chahti hoon ki aap sab mere saath chalein. Dhanyavaad!
